content: July 31 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2015 GMT on Friday:
name: Berry Global Group Inc
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: Plastic packaging products maker Berry Plastics Group Inc  said it would buy Avintiv Inc  which makes materials used in products ranging from diapers to disinfectant wipes  for about $2.45 billion in cash from Blackstone Group LP .
name: Berry Global Group Inc
title: Berry Plastics to buy Blackstone-owned Avintiv for $2.45 billion

content: July 31 Plastic packaging products maker Berry Plastics Group Inc said it would buy Avintiv Inc  which makes materials used in products ranging from diapers to disinfectant wipes  for about $2.45 billion in cash from Blackstone Group LP.
name: Berry Global Group Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Berry Plastics to buy Blackstone-owned Avintiv for $2.45 bln
